title: PROTEST: STOP GIVNG RIOT ANY MONEY UNTIL RIOT SHOWS IMPROVEMENT
body:
please riot can you guys do something about the toxic trash players in this game?
you have your new volunteers on boards telling us it's going to be okay but can you show us some statistics that reports are actually being looked at and bans are being implemented?
every 2 games i have someone telling me to kill myself, slit my wrists or drink bleach. calling me %%%% for no reason and making personal attacks because they get upset things aren't going their way.
or a smurf telling me 'this is my 2nd account i don't give a fuck if we lose because it doesn't effect LOLS'

are you guys trying to promote this childish anti social behavior?

i am going to make one of these posts every day until you guys can show us that you are making an effort to make this a better game for the players and not more skins so you guys get more money.

If my own statistics show anything ive reported maybe 1000 times give or take, probably more even.

Ive seen that message twice.

This is over 6 years worth of reports across multiple accounts mind you.

Now statistically speaking this means each report i make has a 1 in 500 chance of actually getting someone banned.

So in other words a 0.2% chance of a report resulting in a ban.

Or a 99.8% chance of riot ignoring the report or waiting until someone else reports to look at said report (you wont get notification of the ban if you werent the last person to report)

Theres a reason riot isnt transparent about their punishment practices, and its because they arent working and so far the thin ice they are walking on is only holding up because the community either doesnt care that the reports dont work or they dont know.

ive said it before and ill say it again.

No report system riot can think of is acceptable.

Riot SUCKS at community management, period, other companies like blizzard arent as lenient, ive been banned within 20 minutes of insulting someone in trade chat on wow before.

And they have a larger playerbase than us and multiple games to look after so the mere fact that they can have an efficient report system that works and league cant, says more about riots incompetency in that matter than anything else.

Its very clear that riot does not want to put the effort into something that literally will not create a net profit, infact itd lose them money, which is why we need the tribunal.

Because the only way we are going to get a system that works is if the system doesn't cost riot money to hire people, aka the tribunal.

Granted this would be solved if riot wasnt so money hungry, and no one can deny that, chroma skins, the fact they will happily throw money at art teams to design skin after skin but wont throw money at a programmer team to fix up their spaghetti code.

The fact that the alpha client (which i use btw so trust me when i say this) is being developed at a snails pace because the team behind it clearly doesnt have enough manpower or funding.

And the client we have in live is the same client weve had for what 3 years now?

Or how about sandbox mode, and replays etc.

All things we were promised but due to the fact it wont make riot money are so far on the backburner they probably wont see the light of day, instead they will release the 50th chroma pack.

"i know we said sandbox mode was coming out today but we had a great idea, Ultimate Chroma packs, now you can chroma your ultimate skins, only $30 a pack, sandbox delayed till further notice"

So its not a 1 in 500, its a 1/10, which gets reduced every time you report someone just because you were a little tilted

I dont report from tilt, i report because someone deserves a report.

The reason i have so many of them under my belt is because bronze is just that full of trolls and toxic players.

Hell half the time i dont even report people, i only report if they were especially shitty.

i just went through your posts and tried to find the latest example of a non cynical response, that was constructive rather than plain criticism or sarcasm.

im currently at about a month ago, i just found one.

ironically it was a post about pokemon go so not even related to league.

The next non asshole comment i saw you post was 3 months ago.

Id estimate what 30-50 comments.

2 of them you didnt have a cynical 80 year old man fed up with life attitude.

Yet you have the nerve to call me an ass because i dont like the way riot conducts themselves and the inadequate performance of the mmr system.

And btw before you are like "well if you were good your mmr would be higher" or bring up my winrate again.

My winrate is going up by about 1% every 30 days give or take.

As in the more games i play, the higher my winrate.

That doesn't show that i belong in this elo, that shows that i am currently in a state of fixing a statistical outlier in my match history.

i predict ill be at 50% winrate in about half way through October and will continue to rise since i am a mere 28 games away from equilibrium and have been hovering between 28 and 20 games for the last couple days with it only returning to 28 after a particularly bad game tilting me and turning into a lose streak.

By that logic though i wont be silver this season, but ill expect atleast b2 if not b1 before the season ends.

Assuming i keep my head level, and dont run into complete retards too often.

Sorry sweety but you already own the title of biggest ass in oce.

You reply to pretty much every one of my comments and you have the exact same "holier than thou" attitude every time.

For instance remember that one you came in and bitched where i was complaining about smurfs?

Thankfully im friends with some of the emissaries and while you were bitching your ass off they were helping me get the %%%% banned, because they reviewed his match history and realized i was right.

But yeah, keep going around thinking you are right because you have a biased opinion about me.

Oh and what costitutes a report from me?

intent feeding.

Harassment of teammates that goes beyond the simple "you are bad and should go back to bots" im not hypocrit im not gonna report someone for saying the same shit i do, but if they actually harass them and dont have a point, you bet your ass they are getting reported.

Like i said, bronze is just that full of toxicity and trolls.

Its not your fault though sweety, being silver 4 for what im gonna assume is a long time, you havnt to deal with the level of bullshit thats down here in awhile.

While the skill differential is minor between bronze and silver (before you complain that im saying you are as good as a bronzie, its true, im currently premade with 2 people who were silver last season and one bloke who was gold last season, and i was b1 in silver promos, we are all stuck in b5 right now, you arent better than us) the attitude is very different, People down here consist of literal fucking children, stoners and other drug addicts, smurfs that cant handle their own elo, and %%%%s like me who get tilted easily and often, its a breeding ground for toxicity and tilt, real tilt, not "oh im not in a good mood right now" i mean "oh fuck this my team wont engage so ill fucking engage for them useless %%%%s" where if you were in a good mood youd stop and think "thats a retarded idea" the kind of tilt that makes you think emotionally.

Like honestly mate everyone fucking agrees with that, fuck im friends with a couple diamond players who agree with me that bronze, is the fucking hardest elo to climb out of, not because the players are good, on the contrary its because of how bad they are, unless you are ghandi himself and have achieved nirvana, you will tilt period, you will get angry at trolls, period, and you will end up being toxic, period.
